In 1958 a Russian nuclear installation exploded at Kyshtym. Radioactive clouds devastated the countrside for hundreds of miles. This area of the Ural Mountains is now a wasteland that cannot be safely inhabited for millenia.

It's interesting to note the U.S. Government hid this CIA report for almost 20 years.

It only came to light in 1977 under the Freedom of Information Act.
